extension.name: System - NS Font Awesome
extension.author: Natural Selection Web Design LLC
extension.description:
Description

NS Font Awesome inserts glyph icons into standard html elements using CSS. No icons to load or manually insert!

Give us a Review

If you use NS FontAwesome please post a review on the Joomla! Extensions Directory.

Go Pro

Updrade to the Pro version and get access to more tools! It includes:
  • Icon insertion button
  • Icon picker tool
  • Ability to set colors via a color picker
  • Ability to set sizes
  • See icons in the WYSIWYG editor
  • Ability to add FA icons to menu items
  • Access to ticket support
